## TSPS 2.5 - Business Process Consultant (Senior) - SAP Financial Process Transformation
### English
#### Contracting Details

*   Contract Title: TSPS 2.5 Business Process Consultant (Senior) - SAP Financial Process Transformation
*   Solicitation Number: W0152-23-AA165
*   Tender Closing Date: February 14, 2023, 2:00:00 PM EST
*   Contact Information:
*   Name: Caleb Wallace
*   Email: ADMFinProcurement-ApprovisionnementSMAFin@forces.gc.ca

### French
#### Détails sur le contrat

*   Titre du contrat: SPTS 2.5 Expert-conseil en processus opérationnel (Supérieur) - Transformation des processus financiers SAP
*   Numéro d'appel d'offres : W0152-23-AA165
*   Date limite d'appel d'offres: 14 février 2023, à 14h00 heure normale de l'est (UTC - 5)
*   Informations de contact:
*   Nom : Caleb Wallace
*   Courriel : ADMFinProcurement-ApprovisionnementSMAFin@forces.gc.ca

### Description of the Requirement

The Department of National Defence (DND) seeks to contract for a Senior Business Process Consultant to provide strategic advice to the Director, Financial Systems Integration (DFSI) in support of DND's multiple SAP initiatives, including the SAP S4/HANA enterprise resource planning platform. The objective is to contract for a consultant to provide strategic advice in support of DND's SAP initiatives.

### Characteristics of the Engagement

*   Job Type: Contractor
*   Needed Skills: Business process consulting and SAP S4/HANA
*   Security Clearance: Reliability (Intermediate Level)
*   Other: Familiarity with the DND financial system and processes.

### What We Are Looking For

*   An experienced Business Process Consultant (BPC) with a strong background in enterprise resource planning (ERP) system implementation and integration
*   Prior experience in managing software implementation projects and team delivery of business process consulting services
*   Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
*   Excellent communication and facilitation skills to ensure effective collaboration with SMEs and stakeholders
